project.name: nme-tiled
project.description: nme-tiled is a library, which gives NME developers the possibility to use the TILED Map Editor.
project.version: Made getInnerTexturePositionX/Y private and added getInnerTexturePositionByGID, added getTilesetByGID to TiledMap, Added Tile, made Layer.tiles to a Tile-Array (instead of an Int-Array), added Helper.getText(string) and Helper.getBitmapData(string), should be possible to override them to use another asset manager instead of "nme.Assets"
